TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDsaCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa
Public NotInheritable Class ECDsaCng Inherits ECDsa
public ref class ECDsaCng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::ECDsa

summary.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別衍生自抽象基底類別。This class derives from the abstract base class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來簽署訊息，以及如何使用簽章確認訊息未被改變。The following example shows how to use the class to sign a message and how to use the signature to verify that the message has not been altered. [!code-csharp[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必須驗證 (也就是它必須傳回`true`) 時傳遞至方法，而且必須是具名或明確的質數。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method and must be either a named or explicit prime.
